data.message:
It'd be great if you could fix the timeline so I just get recent things and don't keep seeing what my friends posted last week pop up.

That sure be nice....

replies.message: Hi Gareth! To see stories in your News Feed in the order they were posted, click the down arrow next to "News Feed" in your homepage's left column and select "Most Recent." We hope this helps! For more information, feel free to visit our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1nIlfDM. -Rose
Why isn't it default? Why do you make it so complicated? We want updated information, not someone's funeral last year.

I agree with Gareth...I have it set to Most Recent, but at any given time it will change to Top Stories.  And about once every few weeks, it changes back every time I refresh my News Feed.  Once we make a choice, it should stick.
